headline: Assessing Salesforce (CRM) Valuation As AI Partnerships Expand And Analyst Support Builds Ahead Of Earnings
summary: Renewed attention on Salesforce (CRM) is being driven by fresh analyst support for its AI roadmap and an expanded collaboration with Asymbl on workforce orchestration. Investors are also looking ahead to the upcoming earnings release. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. Despite the AI-focused contracts, acquisitions and job cuts, Salesforce’s 30 day share price return of 18.85% and year to date share price return of 27.34% decline point to fading momentum. headline: Exclusive Thought Leadership Event TLFT 2026 Returns to New York City
summary: iResearch Services, a leading global B2B thought leadership agency, has announced the return of Thought Leadership for Tomorrow (TLFT) 2026, the premier invite-only event for senior decision-makers shaping the future of thought leadership. In its fourth-year running, and following the success of TLFT 2025, which convened over 100 industry leaders and 27 speakers from organizations including Google, Morgan Stanley, Salesforce, LinkedIn, IBM, KPMG, and Deloitte, the 2026 event promises an even mor
